mapper.select:
SELECT a.mainCode, a.mainName, b.subNum, a.useDiv, a.etcDesc ,to_char(a.createDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDay, a.deleteFlag FROM t_cate_main a left outer join (SELECT mainCode, count(*) subNum FROM t_cate_sub WHERE deleteFlag = 'N' GROUP BY mainCode ) b on a.mainCode = b.mainCode WHERE a.deleteFlag = 'N'
AND a.mainCode like '%' || #{searchMainCode} || '%'
AND a.mainName like '%' || #{searchMainName} || '%'
ORDER BY a.mainCode

SELECT maincode, subcode, subname, subvalue, subvalue2, subvalue3, vieworder, usediv, etcdesc ,to_char(createdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDay, deleteflag FROM t_cate_sub WHERE maincode = #{maincode} ORDER BY vieworder
SELECT maincode, mainname FROM t_cate_main WHERE mainCode = #{mainCode} ORDER BY mainCode

SELECT maincode, subcode, subname, subvalue, subvalue2, subvalue3, vieworder, usediv, etcdesc,to_char(createDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDay, deleteFlag FROM t_cate_sub WHERE mainCode = #{mainCode} ORDER BY vieworder FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cate_sub( maincode, subcode, subname, subvalue, subvalue2, subvalue3, vieworder, usediv, etcdesc, createdate, createuser, modifydate, modifyuser, deleteflag) VALUES (#{mainCode}, (SELECT trim(to_char(to_number(coalesce(max(subCode),'0'),'999')+1,'009')) FROM t_cate_sub where mainCode = #{mainCode}), #{subName}, #{subValue}, #{subValue2}, #{subValue3}, #{viewOrder}, #{useDiv}, #{etcDesc}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, 'N');
